title: 求几条命令指令
author: a164729252
txt_content:
苦力怕不会毁方块
死亡不掉落
获得升100级的经验
谢谢

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule mobGriefing f
/gamerule keepInventory f
/xp 100L
求最佳
